content: by side and sew together using whip stitch sew to the back of the body between rounds 10 and 11 use small stitches to anchor the upper part of the wings to the body © akabekobotan 2022 forewing use light blue yarn foundation 6 st magic_ring round 1 2dc in each st 12 st round 2 *1dc 2dc in 1 st* repeat ** to end of round 18 st round 3 4dc 2htr in 1 st 2 treble_crochet in 1 st four times 2htr in 1 st 8dc round 4 *3dc 2dc in i st* repeat ** 2htr in 1 st 2 treble_crochet in 1 st 3 chain picot 2 treble_crochet in 1 st 2htr in 1 st repeat ** 3 times slip_stitch invisible fasten_off leaving a long tail place both pieces side by side and sew together using whip stitch sew to the back of the body between rounds 12 and 14 use small stitches to anchor the lower part of the forewings to the hindwings dental pliers using the knitting bee and dark grey yarn make two 8 5cm i-cords cut several eight 8cm lengths of twist tie or use two 16cm lengths of pipe cleaner folded in half before tightening off insert the twist ties or pipe cleaner into the i-cord as shown on the right weave in ends bend the stiffened i-cords into shape and sew together as shown on the right stabilise the jaws of the pliers by sewing the tips together © akabekobotan 2022 finishing sew the dental pliers to the arm and anchor them to the leg for stability using black yarn embroider the detail on the face using whipped backstitch now book an appointment with your dentist i am not a monster i do what any normal person would do with teeth i eat them ta-ta-ra-ta-ta © akabekobotan 2022
